publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-499.1 Mike Rumbles: Managing the Risk of Flooding in Scotlandâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-499) in the name of Richard Lochhead, insert at end "further believes that there are policy and funding issues that can be addressed in advance of primary legislation, and regrets that no commitments have been made to increase financial resources to address this important issue."
